text: goal libminer provide overview R library setup. toy package.

title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: can install development version libminer GitHub :

title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: get count installed packages libraries, optionally total sizes, use lib_summary().
code: library(libminer)  lib_summary() #>                                                                 library #> 1                                    C:/Program Files/R/R-4.3.1/library #> 2                        C:/Users/Darby/AppData/Local/R/win-library/4.3 #> 3 C:/Users/Darby/AppData/Local/Temp/Rtmp8EfBL3/temp_libpath2f2c7b6a5c2a #>   n_packages #> 1         30 #> 2         97 #> 3          1  # specify sizes = TRUE lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                 library #> 1                                    C:/Program Files/R/R-4.3.1/library #> 2                        C:/Users/Darby/AppData/Local/R/win-library/4.3 #> 3 C:/Users/Darby/AppData/Local/Temp/Rtmp8EfBL3/temp_libpath2f2c7b6a5c2a #>   n_packages  lib_size #> 1         30  68858812 #> 2         97 163364538 #> 3          1     13315

title: Library Summary — lib_summary
text: Provides brief summary package libraries machine.

title: Library Summary — lib_summary
text: sizes logicial value indicating whether calculate sizes. Default FALSE

title: Library Summary — lib_summary
text: data.frame containing count packages user's libraries. sizes = TRUE, column library sizes added.

title: Library Summary — lib_summary
code: lib_summary() #>                           library n_packages #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                           library n_packages lib_size #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 72680768 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 69575875 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 14838588
